hardwork.author: Pele
hardwork.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

hardwork.author: Colin Powell
hardwork.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

hardwork.author: Colin Powell
hardwork.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.

hardwork.author: Colin Powell
hardwork.quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.

hardwork.author: Gail Devers
hardwork.quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.

hardwork.author: Dwayne Johnson
hardwork.quote: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come.

hardwork.author: Vince Lombardi
hardwork.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.

hardwork.author: Newt Gingrich
hardwork.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.

hardwork.author: Tommy Hilfiger
hardwork.quote: The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive and passion, it's possible to achieve the American dream.

hardwork.author: Margaret Mead
hardwork.quote: I learned the value of hard work by working hard.

hardwork.author: John Carmack
hardwork.quote: Focused, hard work is the real key to success. Keep your eyes on the goal, and just keep taking the next step towards completing it. If you aren't sure which way to do something, do it both ways and see which works better.

hardwork.author: Pope Paul VI
hardwork.quote: All life demands struggle. Those who have everything given to them become lazy, selfish, and insensitive to the real values of life. The very striving and hard work that we so constantly try to avoid is the major building block in the person we are today.

hardwork.author: Jahangir Khan
hardwork.quote: Without hard work and discipline it is difficult to be a top professional.

hardwork.author: Gordon B. Hinckley
hardwork.quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.

hardwork.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
hardwork.quote: If four things are followed - having a great aim, acquiring knowledge, hard work, and perseverance - then anything can be achieved.

hardwork.author: Ben Carson
hardwork.quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.

hardwork.author: Kevin Eubanks
hardwork.quote: Inspiration is one thing and you can't control it, but hard work is what keeps the ship moving. Good luck means, work hard. Keep up the good work.

hardwork.author: Calvin Coolidge
hardwork.quote: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers. It may not be difficult to store up in the mind a vast quantity of facts within a comparatively short time, but the ability to form judgments requires the severe discipline of hard work and the tempering heat of experience and maturity.

hardwork.author: Thomas A. Edison
hardwork.quote: There is no substitute for hardwork.

hardwork.author: Kevin Hart
hardwork.quote: Everybody wants to be famous, but nobody wants to do the work. I live by that. You grind hard so you can play hard. At the end of the day, you put all the work in, and eventually it'll pay off. It could be in a year, it could be in 30 years. Eventually, your hard work will pay off.

hardwork.author: Vince Lombardi
hardwork.quote: Football is like life - it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.

hardwork.author: Stephen King
hardwork.quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.

hardwork.author: Derek Jeter
hardwork.quote: When you put a lot of hard work into one goal and you achieve it, that's a really good feeling.

hardwork.author: Heather Bresch
hardwork.quote: There is simply no substitute for hard work when it comes to achieving success.

hardwork.author: Ann Landers
hardwork.quote: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.
